name: Laugh with Me
description:
Walking in this rainy city, filled with people around, everyone has their own things to attend to and business to stress about. No one just laughs and runs around anymore. And you just feel so lonely... 

But wait. You're not alone. There're some people out there that would love to listen to your stories. 

So come and dance with me, vibe with me, laugh with me.

Playthrough Video: https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Zd4y1N7qD?spm_id_from=333.880.my_history.page....

[ Controls ]

WASD or Left Stick to Move

Press Space / Xbox A to Vibe

[ Creators ]

Sam Feng - Programming & Music - @samfenggames

Eizi Yu - Programming & Level Design - @EiZi_GAMES

[ Credits ]

This game is created with Unreal Engine 5 and FMOD.

Special thanks Mixamo & Freesounds.org for animations and sounds.
